title: TransmittanceRange
description: This records the range of wavelengths that are transmitted by the filter. It also records the maximum amount of light transmitted. Multiple of this elements can be used.

subCategoriesOrder.TransmittanceRange: This records the range of wavelengths that are transmitted by the filter. It also records the maximum amount of light transmitted. Multiple of this elements can be used.

CutIn.description: CutIn is the wavelength below which the response rate is below 50%.

CutOut.description: CutOut is the wavelength above which the response rate is below 50%. Leave empty in case this is a longpass filter.

Transmittance.description: The maximum amount of light this optical component is capable of transmitting at the peak wavelenght. It is represented as a fractional value from 0.0 to 1.0.

Tier.description: The tier level of this component.
